name: Vankia Chain
description: Vankia Chain is a data service company relying on the Internet of Things technology. Vankia Chain has used its self-developed data acquisition hardware to build a wealth of digital assets and realize data assetization-a decentralized data service where data assets can be traded, transactions can be queried, and transaction revenue can be distributed. Vanguard Chain has designed two layers of tokens (VKT & VKG) for value transmission on the chain
